text: Peter Hans Docter (born October 9, 1968) is an American animator, director, producer, screenwriter and voice actor. == Early life == Docter was born in Bloomington, Minnesota to Rita Margaret Kanne and David Reinhardt Docter. His parents are of Danish, English, French, German, Irish, Mohawk Native American, Scottish and Welsh descent. ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:American animators Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:Living people Category:Pixar
title: Pete Docter
